text: Ivan Vladimirovich Maksimov (; born 11 June 1995) is a Russian football midfielder. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Anzhi-2 Makhachkala on 25 October 2014 in a game against FC Terek-2 Grozny. He made his Russian Football National League debut for FC Tosno on 11 July 2015 in a game against FC Fakel Voronezh. ==Personal life== His is the younger brother of footballer Ilya Maksimov. ==References== ==External links== * Career summary by sportbox.ru Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tosno players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:FC Anzhi Makhachkala players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo players Category:FC Volga Nizhny Novgorod players
title: Ivan Maksimov (footballer)
